kodkod.core.sat2cnf
Class Sat2CnfTranslator

java.lang.Object
  kodkod.core.sat2cnf.Sat2CnfTranslator
All Implemented Interfaces:
BooleanVisitor<org.sat4j.specs.IVecInt,java.lang.Object>
public final class Sat2CnfTranslator
extends java.lang.Object
implements BooleanVisitor<org.sat4j.specs.IVecInt,java.lang.Object>

Translates a boolean formula to a CNF represented as vectors readable by minSAT solvers.

Author:
Emina Torlak
specfield:
allocator: BooleanVariableAllocator
solver: ISolver

Method Detail

translate

public static void translate(AnnotatedBooleanValue formula,
                             org.sat4j.specs.ISolver solver)
                      throws ContradictionException
Translates the given annotated boolean value to cnf by adding cnf clauses to the given solver.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - - formula = null || solver = null
ContradictionException - - formula is trivally false
effects:
solver contains the cnf clauses that correspond to the value of the given annotated formula

visit

public org.sat4j.specs.IVecInt visit(MultiGate multigate,
                                     java.lang.Object arg)
Adds translation clauses to the solver and returns a VecInt containing the gate's literal. The CNF clauses are generated according to the standard SAT to CNF translation: o = AND(i1, i2, ... ik) ---> (i1 | !o) & (i2 | !o) & ... & (ik | !o) & (!i1 | !i2 | ... | !ik | o), o = OR(i1, i2, ... ik) ---> (!i1 | o) & (!i2 | o) & ... & (!ik | o) & (i1 | i2 | ... | ik | !o).

Specified by:
visit in interface BooleanVisitor<org.sat4j.specs.IVecInt,java.lang.Object>
Returns:
o: VecInt | o.size() = 1 && o.get(0) = multigate.literal
effects:
if the multigate has not yet been visited, its children are visited and the clauses are added to the solver connecting the multigate's literal to its input literal, as described above.

visit

public org.sat4j.specs.IVecInt visit(NotGate negation,
                                     java.lang.Object arg)
Returns the negation of the result of visiting negation.input, wrapped in a VecInt.

Specified by:
visit in interface BooleanVisitor<org.sat4j.specs.IVecInt,java.lang.Object>
Returns:
o: VecInt | o.size() = 1 && o.get(0) = - translate(negation.inputs).get(0)

visit

public org.sat4j.specs.IVecInt visit(BooleanVariable variable,
                                     java.lang.Object arg)
Returns the variable's literal wrapped in a VecInt.
